en.Name: Amaretto Sour
en.recipe:
1 - Create simple syrup by dissolving sugar in the same amount of water.
 2 - Pour the Amaretto, simple syrup, and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. 
 3 - Shake and strain into a glass filled with ice. 
 4 - Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry

en.Name: Aviation
en.recipe:
1 - Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
 2 - Add all of your delicious liquid ingredients to the shaker and cover tightly with the lid. 
 3 - Shake vigorously until the shaker becomes chilled to the touch (about 30 seconds). 
 4 - Immediately strain into a coupe glass like this. 
 5 - Garnish the drink with a maraschino cherry and enjoy.

en.Name: Bellini
en.recipe:
1 - Add all of your delicious liquid ingredients to the shaker and cover tightly with the lid. 
 2 - Shake vigorously until the shaker becomes chilled to the touch (about 30 seconds). 
 3 - Immediately strain into a glass.

en.Name: Black Russian
en.recipe:
1 - Place ice in a rocks glass. 
 2 - Pour the vodka and coffee liqueur into the glass.

en.Name: Boulevardier
en.recipe:
1 - Add all the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice, and stir until well-chilled.
 2 - Strain into a rocks glass filled with large ice cubes.
 3 - Garnish with an orange peel.

en.Name: Negroni
en.recipe:
1 - Add all the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice, and stir until well-chilled.
 2 - Strain into a rocks glass filled with large ice cubes.
 3 - Garnish with an orange peel.

en.Name: Americano
en.recipe:
1 - Add Campari and Vermouth into a mixing glass with ice, and stir until well-chilled.
 2 - Strain into a rocks glass filled with large ice cubes. 
 3 - Splash soda water onto it and garinsh with an orange peel.

en.Name: Caffo
en.recipe:
1 - Pour the Amaretto and orange juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. 
 2 - Shake and strain into a glass filled with ice. 
 3 - Garnish with an orange/lemon slice

en.Name: Cosmopolitan
en.recipe:
1 - Fill a shaker three-fourths full with ice. 
 2 - Add the vodka, juices and Triple Sec. 
 3 - Cover and shake for 10-15 seconds or until condensation forms on outside of shaker. 
 4 - Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. 
 5 - Garnish as desired.

en.Name: Daiquiri
en.recipe:
1 - Create simple syrup by dissolving sugar in the same amount of water.
 2 - Add all of the ingredients with ice to a shaker. 
 3 - Shake and strain into a glass filled with ice.

en.Name: Gin Tonic
en.recipe:
1 - Add all of the ingredients with ice to a shaker. 
 2 - Shake and strain into a glass filled with ice
 3 - Garnish with lime.

en.Name: Gin Fizz
en.recipe:
1 - Add all of the ingredients (except for soda water) with ice to a shaker. 
 2 - Shake and strain into a glass filled with ice
 3 - Add the soda water.

en.Name: Greyhound
en.recipe:
1 - Add all of the ingredients with ice to a shaker. 
 2 - Shake and strain into a glass filled with ice
 3 - Garnish with lime.

en.Name: Hot Toddy
en.recipe: 1 -Mix all ingredients into a mug.

en.Name: Irish Coffee
en.recipe:
1 - Heat up the mug. 
 2 - Then youll want to add the sugar to your mug. Pour in the hot coffee and stir to dissolve. After that, pour in the Irish whiskey.
 3 - In a small bowl, beat the whipping cream until thick and foamy. For an extra kick, you can stir in a teaspoon of green creme de menthe, like in this recipe. 
 4 -Gently spoon the cream mixture onto the drinks, allowing it to float. Top with chocolate flakes or sprinkle on some nutmeg or cinnamon, if desired.

en.Name: Lemon Martini
en.recipe:
1 - Using lemon slice, moisten the rim of a chilled cocktail glass set lemon aside.
2 -  Sprinkle sugar on a plate; hold glass upside down and dip rim into sugar. Discard remaining sugar on plate.
 3 - Fill a shaker three-fourths full with ice. Add vodka, limoncello and lemon juice; cover and shake until condensation forms on outside of shaker, 10-15 seconds.
4 - Strain into prepared glass. Garnish with lemon slice

en.Name: Long Island
en.recipe:
1 - For a single serving of this tasty drink, place the ice in a Collins or highball glass. Pour all ingredients except the cola into the glass. 
2 - Top the drink off with some cola and give it a quick stir with a barspoon, like this one. Garnish with lemon, if desired.

en.Name: Mai Tai
en.recipe:
1 -  Fill a shaker three-fourths full with ice. Place remaining ice in a rocks glass; set aside.
2 - Add the rum, triple sec, juices and amaretto to shaker; cover and shake for 10-15 seconds or until condensation forms on outside of shaker. Strain into prepared glass. Garnish as desired.

en.Name: Manhattan
en.recipe:
1 - Fill a shaker three-fourths full with ice. Add the whiskey, vermouth and bitters if desired
2 - cover and shake until condensation forms on outside of shaker.
3 - Strain into an ice-filled glass.
4 - Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

en.Name: Margarita
en.recipe:
1 - Pour some kosher salt into a wide bowl or small dish. Take a wedge of lime and generously rub it around the rim of your glass. Dip the rim into the salt.
2 - Fill the glass with some fresh ice and set aside.
3 - Place the tequila, orange liqueur, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake for 10 seconds, and then strain into a prepared cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge if desired.
